MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: description: Explains how to implement a XAML attached property as a dependency property and how to define the accessor convention that is necessary for your attached property to be usable in XAML. title: Custom attached properties ms.assetid: E9C0C57E-6098-4875-AA3E-9D7B36E160E0

CodeSpanItem.ItemValue: (ByVal target As DependencyObject, ByVal value As
(ByVal target As DependencyObject, ByVal value As

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block:
Public Class GameService Inherits DependencyObject
Public Shared ReadOnly IsMovableProperty As DependencyProperty = DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("IsMovable", GetType(Boolean), GetType(GameService), New PropertyMetadata(False))
Public Shared Sub SetIsMovable(ByRef element As UIElement, value As Boolean) element.SetValue(IsMovableProperty, value) End Sub
Public Shared Function GetIsMovable(ByRef element As UIElement) As Boolean GetIsMovable = CBool(element.GetValue(IsMovableProperty)) End Function End Class
